DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Investigating immediate effect Low Level Laser Therapy ( LLLT ) neuromuscular performance healthy subject induced muscle fatigue protocol . Methods : Eighty volunteer gender age 18 28 year underwent preliminary evaluation use surface electromyography isokinetic dynamometer flexor muscle elbow . The subject randomly allocate 4 group : G1 control group ; G2 placebo ; G3 laser apply fatigue protocol ; G4 immediately . Muscular fatigue protocol consist 30 maximal concentric isokinetic contraction 120Â°/s elbow flexor muscle . An 808 nm equipment use apply laser therapy , power 100 mW total energy 20 J . Volunteers reassess intervention .
DOC.criteria: Being 1828 year age , pain shoulder area , elbow hand , suffer injury assess upper limb last six month . Presenting pain prevent completion evaluation , subject whose data improperly record volunteer withdrew study .
